Title: 448-Gb/s PAM4 transmission over 300-km SMF-28 without dispersion compensation fiber
Abstract: © OSA 2018.We report on 4×112Gb/s direct-detection PAM4 transmission over 300-km standard single mode fiber. Chromatic dispersion is digitally compensated at the transmitter side.
